column1: echo ¦useradd¦jedi --create-home --password jedi && echo "jedi:jedi" | chpasswd && adduser jedi sudo :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦cd¦/tmp && wget https://downloads.arduino.cc/arduino-1.6.8-linux64.tar.xz && tar xf arduino-1.6.8-linux64.tar.xz && mv arduino-1.6.8 /home/jedi && echo "export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/arduino-1.6.8" >> /home/jedi/.bashrc :: Filesystem_operation
